meanings.definition: Existing, occurring, or formed in the open air rather than underwater.
meanings.sent1: The subaerial plants thrived in the sunlight outside.
meanings.sent2: The subaerial environment is different from the underwater world.
meanings.sent3: The subaerial picnic was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: Her subaerial perspective gave her a new outlook on life.
meanings.sent5: The subaerial landscape was painted with vibrant colors under the sky.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the land surface above the water level.
meanings.sent1: The subaerial terrain was dry and rocky.
meanings.sent2: Subaerial features include mountains and valleys.
meanings.sent3: The subaerial hike offered stunning views of the lake below.
meanings.sent4: His subaerial kingdom was vast and unexplored.
meanings.sent5: The subaerial world was teeming with life above the water.
